Class Gun

  • java.lang.Object
    • Gun

  • class Gun
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates a Gun: can shoot (and sometimes miss, depending on accuracy), reload, and, if it has a scope, can scope in to increase accuracy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) double accuracy 
      (package private) double adjustedAccuracy 
      (package private) int currentAmmo 
      (package private) boolean hasScope 
      (package private) boolean isScoped 
      (package private) int maxAmmo 
      (package private) java.lang.String name 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Gun(java.lang.String name, int maxAmmo, double accuracy, boolean hasScope)
      Initializes a Gun object, taking paramters of name, maximum ammo, accuracy, and whether the gun has a scope

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void print()
      Prints out all the data from the toString() method
      void reload()
      Reloads the gun, setting currentAmmo to maxAmmo
      boolean shoot()
      Shoots gun, misses depending on accuracy
      void shoot(int times)
      Shoots gun multiple times
      void toggleScope()
      Toggles the gun's scope (if it has one)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Gun

        public Gun(java.lang.String name,
           int maxAmmo,
           double accuracy,
           boolean hasScope)
        Initializes a Gun object, taking paramters of name, maximum ammo, accuracy, and whether the gun has a scope
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the gun
        maxAmmo - the gun's ammo capacity
        accuracy - the chance (out of 1) that the gun will hit its target
        hasScope - whether the gun has a scope

    • Method Detail

      • shoot

        public boolean shoot()
        Shoots gun, misses depending on accuracy
        Returns:
        false if out of ammo, true if it shoots successfully

      • shoot

        public void shoot(int times)
        Shoots gun multiple times
        Parameters:
        times - number of times to shoot the gun

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Reloads the gun, setting currentAmmo to maxAmmo

      • toggleScope

        public void toggleScope()
        Toggles the gun's scope (if it has one)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String representation of the gun
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the gun's name, current ammo, max ammo, and accuracy; if the gun has a scope, the method also returns whether it is scoped

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints out all the data from the toString() method
